subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Independence High School in Charlotte, N.C., had its 109-game winning streak end Saturday night when it lost at Cincinnati’s Elder High in overtime, 41-34, in the Kirk Herbstreit Challenge. The streak, which began seven years ago, was the nation’s longest.Independence (1-1) had not lost since falling to Shelby Crest, 34-31, on Sept. 1, 2000.
